Classes in fr.umlv.tatoo.runtime.buffer.impl used by fr.umlv.tatoo.runtime.buffer.impl
AbstractBufferWrapper
          Abstract base class for buffer that can tracks line and column position in a text.
LocationTracker
          A class that is able to map buffer position to text location.
UTF8Wrapper
          The class provides a buffer for using with a lexer build with UTF-8 encoding (UTF8Encoding).
 

Classes in fr.umlv.tatoo.runtime.buffer.impl used by fr.umlv.tatoo.runtime.tools.builder
ReaderWrapper
          A ReaderWrapper wraps a Reader in order to allow a lexer to process its content in order to have its tokens extracted.
